title: APM Therapie | Naturheilpraxis Balance | Oberlunkhofen
description: Die APM - Therapie ist eine ganzheitliche Therapiemethode, die bei chronischen und akuten körperlichen Beschwerden eingesetzt wird. Die Naturheilpraxis Balance ist in Oberlunkhofen.
text:
Do you want to bring your body into balance?
Many different factors can cause physiological imbalances. In addition to a genetic predisposition to certain weaknesses, our lifestyle and dietary choices impact this physical equilibrium. Utilising a holistic therapeutic approach, I will work individually with you to improve your physical health, general wellbeing and overall quality of life.
The therapy is suitable for babies, children, pregnant women and adults.
APM - Therapy
-
Holistic treatment
-
Energy balancing without needles on acupuncture points
-

-
